description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nDon't Touch My Garbage:
This creature gains a copy of all different [temporary] Ethereal Spell Gems other creatures receive after start-of-battle effects. After this creature is killed, each other creature takes damage equal to 3% of the stats corresponding to its gems' classes per [temporary] Ethereal Spell Gem it has. After this creature is resurrected, it is killed.
name: Filthy Gem
